pageContext.claim: “I mean truly dishonest people in the media and the fake media, they make up stories. They have no sources in many cases. They say 'a source says' -- there is no such thing.”
pageContext.analysis: Legitimate news organizations do not simply make up stories and invent sources. That's grounds for swift dismissal. Sometimes, reporters get things wrong, of course. But that's different than simply making up a story out of thin air.
